name: Young Shattered Time Dragon

specials.name: Draconic Frenzy
specials.description: The dragon makes two claw Strikes and one tail Strike in any order.

specials.name: Draconic Momentum
specials.description: When the dragon scores a critical hit with a Strike, it recharges its Breath Weapon.

specials.name: Furious Rage
specials.description:
Trigger: Taking any form of ranged damage
Effect: The damaging creature must attempt a DC 20 reflex save. If it _fails_, it takes half the damage it would have dealt to the dragon. If it _critically fails_, it would take all of the damage it would have dealt instead.

specials.name: Breath Weapon
specials.description: The dragon opens its ridged mouth, fiurious with rage, it gushes a cloud seemingly made of sharp, tempered glass. Shearing your skin as it envelops you. This glass cloud deals 3d6 slashing damage, and 1d12 persistent bleed damage in a 30-foot cone (DC 20 basic Reflex save). This ability takes 1d4 rounds to recharge.

specials.name: Reflective Coating
specials.description:
Upon taking damage from a ranged attack, the dragon can trigger Reflective Coating.
Upon the player succeeded a DC 20 basic Reflex check, the player will take half the ranged damage they were to heal, the dragon takes no damage.

description: Once the chronoball has been shattered, the breaking fractures out through the scales, turning it into a jagged dragon coated in tempered glass. The green in between its scales, and the green in his eyes turns to red, as he's overcome with sheer anger and rage.
